mapper.select: select last_number - 1 from user_sequences where sequence_name = 'DECK_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deckSources (decksource_id, deck_id, p_card, o_card, d_card, y_card, is_thumbnail) VALUES (decksource_seq.NEXTVAL, #{deck_id}, #{p_card}, #{o_card}, #{d_card}, #{y_card}, #{is_thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM decks WHERE cat = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM decks WHERE cat = 1 AND deck_title LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT d.deck_id, d.deck_title, d.create_date, u.user_id, d.recommend, p.card_image FROM decks d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id JOIN deckSources ds ON d.deck_id = ds.deck_id JOIN pokemon p ON ds.p_card = p.card_id WHERE ds.is_thumbnail = 1 AND d.cat = #{cat} AND d.deck_title LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ORDER BY
d.recommend DESC
d.create_date DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rn >= #{startRow} ORDER BY rn
